name: THE GNOME SEEKER
description:
GNOMES, AS YOU MUST KNOW, ARE HAPPY AND NOBLE CREATURES, THEY TAKE CARE OF THE FOREST AND ITS HABITANTS. IN DAILY LIFE GNOMES HAVE A LOT OF DANGERS TO AVOID, SO THERES ONE SKILL THATS THE MOST VALUABLE FOR ANY GNOME; HIDDING. IN THIS GAME YOU WILL TEST YOUR GNOMES FRIENDS SKILL TO HIDE. TRACK THEM THROUGH THE FOREST, EXPLORE AND PET THE ANIMALS TO MAKE THEM HAPPY.

            THERE ARE LOTS OF SECRETS IN THE GNOME WORLD, USE YOUR GOOD EYE AND YOUR SELF ORIENTATION SKILL TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN YOUR TASK.

            AFTER MASTERING THE GAME I HOPE YOU CAN USE YOUR RECENTLY ACQUIRED SKILL AND SPOT SOME HAPPY GNOMES AT YOUR OWN GARDEN.
